meaningMnemonic: When you have the <kanji>same</kanji> <kanji>feeling</kanji> as someone else, you have <vocabulary>sympathy</vocabulary> for them, because you know how they feel. How kind of you!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
